unavailable_apis: Message type (removed in v5, use UIMessage)
key_features: Output specification API for structured generation via generateText/streamText
Output.object({ schema }) for typed object generation
generateObject and streamObject still work but are DEPRECATED — use Output API
ToolLoopAgent defaults stopWhen to stepCountIs(20) — no longer required
output parameter replaces experimental_output in generateText/streamText
createUIMessageStream and writer API unchanged from v5
breaking_changes: convertToCoreMessages removed — use convertToModelMessages (now async, requires await)
ToolLoopAgent stopWhen defaults to stepCountIs(20) instead of requiring explicit value
generateObject/streamObject deprecated — use generateText/streamText with Output
cachedInputTokens and reasoningTokens deprecated in LanguageModelUsage
textEmbeddingModel renamed to embeddingModel on providers
MockLanguageModelV2/MockProviderV2 replaced by V3 versions in ai/test
notes: Use generateText({ output: Output.object({ schema }) }) instead of generateObject({ schema })
Use streamText({ output: Output.object({ schema }) }) instead of streamObject({ schema })
Access result via { output } from generateText, NOT { object } from generateObject
partialOutputStream (not partialObjectStream) for streaming structured output
ToolLoopAgent({ model, instructions, tools, prepareStep?, stopWhen? })
prepareStep returns { activeTools?, toolChoice?, model? } to control each step
convertToModelMessages MUST be awaited — it is async in v6
CoreMessage does NOT exist — importing it will cause errors
generateObject still works but is deprecated and will be removed
ModelMessage has same structure as old CoreMessage (role, content)
UIMessage unchanged from v5 — still uses .parts array
